text:
Gilles de Richemond, born the 28th of February 1972, is a French aerospace engineer and businessman. He is the actual Head of IT department of AccorHotels.
Graduate from Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées (1997), he started his career in 1998 as journalist. In 2004, He joins Canal Plus and Transavia in 2007. He has been Chief of Voyages-sncf.com. He is also a founding member of the « Agile Consortium » France club.
Since December 2017, he is Head of IT of AccorHotels.
